ygData.subject: RE: Best 1h blunt weapon...
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that a 6 dam 20 delay weapon is just a bit better....depends on if the enameled is magical but the 6 dam 20 delay weapon is 1 h blunt and increases
ygData.messageBody:
I think that a 6 dam 20 delay weapon is just a bit better....depends on if
the enameled is magical but the 6 dam 20 delay weapon is 1 h blunt and
increases your str dex and agi by 2 so it could be a trade off.

-----Original Message-----
From: Justin Howard [mailto:mhoward1@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 11:59 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...

From: "Justin Howard" <mhoward1@...>

8dmg 28delay
-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Ott <mott@...>

Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Best 1h blunt weapon...
